name: Kohan: Immortal Sovereigns
description: Native Linux version from Loki (requires xserver-xephyr and pulseaudio-utils)
notes:
Installs version 1.1.0 from CD-ROM.
Can be manually updated to version 1.3.1.
See: http://updates.lokigames.com/kohan/

insert-disc.message: Mount the Kohan CD-Rom to continue

content:
exe: kohan-launcher
files:
- launcher: https://paste.debian.net/download/1059143
installer:
- insert-disc:
    message: Mount the Kohan CD-Rom to continue
    requires: setup.sh
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/bin/x86
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Cinematics
    src: $DISC/Cinematics
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Maps
    src: $DISC/Maps
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/SAI
    src: $DISC/SAI
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/Kohan.TGW
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/Music.TGW
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/Voice.TGW
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/icon.xpm
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/QuickStart.txt
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/README
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/README.Editor
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/kohan-launcher
    src: launcher
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/kohan-launcher
